basics.name: Paul Nelson
basics.label: Senior Web Engineer
basics.summary: I am passionate about about using my skills to contribute to and inspire teams to create effective solutions to real business problems.

work.summary: I lead teams that deliver products that help consumers to enroll in health insurance either directly or through a licensed agent.
highlights: Turned around low perfoming SCRUM team through coaching, technical leadership and process improvement.
Co-Authored Javascript and AngularJS coding standards complete with pre-commit code analysis and auto-correction.
Brought application used by over 50,000 licensed agents from business charter to production including developing toolset, service architecture, deployment process and monitoring procedurs.
Helped deliver large, single page Angular application that allows consumers to find and compare health insurance plans.

work.summary: Worked with large enterprise companies developing SOA based middleware enabling communication with internal business units and external trading partners.
highlights: Led task force to improve performance on large scale, batch processing jobs.
Designed a DataPower powered front-end suite of SOAP WebServices leveraging WS-Addressing, WS-Security.
Wrote clear, detailed documentation for development and long-term support of enterprise software systems.
Lead a multi-shore development team in a high profile healthcare project

work.summary: Small company covering the real estate industry in Chicago.
highlights: Worked with the Art Director to create seamless brand integration across online and offline channels.
Developed tools to standardize and simplify common tasks
Created custom, online formats for special issues of the print magazine.
Managed a network of over 25 domains and three complex, Wordpress based websites.
